textBox.richText: This is an ongoing and brutal attack on civilians in the south of the Sudan involving issues of oil resources, race, religion, civil war, political expediency, international stumbling, and many more. Hundreds of thousands have died since early 2003. Genocide in Darfur Links Regarding the Genocide in Darfur Films Dealing with the Genocide in Darfur & Sudan Bibliography of the Darfur Genocide On a lighter note, I have added links to connect with me on various social media to the About Me page. The myspace page is not yet set up, and the flickr account is shared with my husband, but everything else has initial content. (The red paperclip is a link to my resumé)
